title: Book Club: Of Women and Salt
itunes:title: Book Club: Of Women and Salt
description:
Gabriela Garcia's Of Women and Salt is a beautiful, heartbreaking and haunting novel tracing the struggles and traumas of generations of women, and how they are connected. Anney and Samantha discuss political and intergenerational trauma, motherhood, immigration, addiction and secret selves. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
